item.title: JavaScript in Hugo
item.description: Running JavaScript inside a Hugo site is quite straightforward since Hugo generates static HTML files that you can enhance with client-side JavaScript. You can include JavaScript for a variety of purposes, such as adding dynamic features, handling forms, or integrating third-party services. Here are the steps to add and run JavaScript in your Hugo site: 1. Add JavaScript Files to Your Hugo Site - Place your JavaScript files inside the `static/js/` folder of your Hugo site.
